MNKD For those that dont believe the power that BP wieldsjust read below They can build as well as destroy businessesand peoples lives Chandler Arizonabased Insys said it filed for bankruptcy in US Bankruptcy Court in the District of Delaware to facilitate a sale of its assets including SubsysInsys listed 1751 million in assets and 2625 million in debt as of March 31 Subsys is an underthetongue spray the US Food and Drug Administration approved in 2012 for treating pain in cancer patients It contains fentanyl an opioid 100 times stronger than morphineProsecutors alleged that while Kapoor was its chairman Insys from 2012 to 2015 used sham speaker programs as a means to pay doctors bribes to prescribe Subsys to patients many of whom did not have cancer

MNKD Poster 136LB is about a 14 patient nonscientific study that is best described as an anecdotal story from an MD who got money from MNKD 151OR is the results of the old MNKD stat study that was refuted 1350P looks at a few patients in their struggling FDA mandated Afrezza post approval ped study thats been going on since 2015 and has been challenged by inability to get 46 patientsany phase three ped study is years and years away Fact is New scripts for Afrezza was an appalling 259 This after getting approved in 2014 Scripts show the reality that this 28 yr old companys inhaled hormone is a historic flop

MNKD without the help of a big pharma company experienced in diabetes drugs it took MNKD years to navigate through development regulatory rough head winds before finally getting Afrezza approved in the US but still left Afrezza well short of being ready prepared to compete in a very competitive diabetes space The same can be said for MNKDs commercial strategy that had no big pharma on board prior to approval to lay a foundation for a proper launch post approval choosing a bad partner Sanofi along with a slow under funded solo strategy hampering sales The fact remains its all about money and as rich as Al Mann was his money was no where near enough to properly fund and leverage MNKDs huge game changing assets intellectual properties Al Mann gave MNKD his development wisdom technology know how vision to create a company that now possesses assets that will revolutionize the healthcare industry but it will require big pharma resources to make it happen

MNKD todays data presented at ADA hits on all the major points afrezza is safe enough for kids with similar results to adults average decrease in A1c of 16 for 93 of subjects in just 3 months getting them below 8 A1c Increased time in range more than 75 in just 3 months with no significant difference in rates of hypoglycemia When compared to rapid acting injected insulin Afrezza provided significantly better glucose control in the first two hours following the meal and significantly less hypoglycemia after 2 hours following mealToday the doctors get to hear this new information and decide whether they want to take part in the paradigm shifting diabetes treatment Afrezza
